title: AWS Step Functions to Amazon S3
description: Creates a Step Functions workflow that puts an object to an S3 bucket.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Step Functions receives an execution request using the `start-execution` API command and puts an object to an S3 bucket using the `PutObject` API call from the AWS SDK service integration.
